#include <iostream>
#include <map>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	int present=1;
	string winner[n];
	map<string,int> mymap;
	string s;
	int i = 0;
	while (n > 0){
		cin >> s;
		if (mymap.find(s) == mymap.end()) {
			mymap[s] = 1;
			if (present <= 1){
				winner[i] = s;
				i++;
				present++;
			}	
		} 
		else {
			mymap[s]++;
			if (present <= mymap[s]){
				winner[i] = s;
				i++;
				present++;
			}
		}
		n = n - 1;
	}
	for (int k = 0; k < i; k++){
		cout << (k+1) << " " << winner[k] << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
